attributes.review: The second I downloaded this app my phone started smelling like shrimp, spray tan, and poop. If you could please fix this problem I would appreciate it. Please find a better smell for this app. 👁👅👁
attributes.title: Very poopoo🟠👄🟠

attributes.review: This app is stressful and Donald Trump is racist fat Bom and if he was a good president he’ll Speak about what happened with George Floyd and all this racism in the black lives✊🏽 industry Donald Trump is just a fat bum that just want wealth and to harm everyone else what have you ever done to this world that was good all the things that he said is a lie nothing that he says is true everything is a lie did you not see what he did to the immigrants go kill yourself Donald Trump go  wash your butt nasty stinky fishy stinky fishy ugly Cheeto I can’t wait till you die and go to hell and I would u laughYou disgusting freak ugly and mean spirited Bom 🤮Every time I see you my eyes burn 😭 Opa-Locka stupidPresident Hillary Clinton 👑is better than you ugly🥴
attributes.title: Horrible president

attributes.review: i got this app to get news on the upcoming election. when i opened the app, instead of a glorious picture of our current president, i saw a giant piece of poop. it wasn’t just any poop though, it was a diarrhea poop. yes i know that you may not believe me but it was so disgusting. my children were with me when i opened the app and it was so disgusting that one of them threw up all over me!! this is unacceptable. no child should ever have to see a picture of poop, especially a diarrhea one. i will have to speak to all of the managers of this app for this shameful mistake of yours. you should all be ashamed on yourselves. (side note: to whoever’s poop that was, please go to a doctor. your poop should not be neon blue)
attributes.title: don’t get this app!!

attributes.review: this is the WORST app to ever exist! Let’s start off with how long it took to install.It took THREE hours to download, which got me very mad, because I have amazing wifi.When I opened the app, lemme tell you how disgusting it was! It had a picture of an orange, a moldy disgusting orange 🤮 It was probably an orange nobody cared about for about 74 years.Such a disgrace!I decided to continue exploring this app, but it turned VERY glitchy. I decided to restart my phone but it made it worse!!! It caused a virus on my phone! It’s stealing all my information and uninstalling my favorite app (i can no longer install it again. I wouldn’t recommend this app to anyone! Please get it off the app store after all this harm it’s done to me and others!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE!
